questions.text: What is the primary reason we experience the cycle of day and night on Earth?
questions.explanation: Day and night are caused by Earth rotating (spinning) on its axis. One side faces the Sun (Day) while the other faces away (Night).
options: The Sun goes around the Earth.
The Earth rotates on its axis.

questions.text: Test answer The Moon blocks the Sun.
